attributes.action: Review spending of Hereford Council to ensure they are accountable to the public
attributes.additional_details: Review how the council spend the public’s money and publish this. This should be done prior to any increase in council tax
attributes.background: Herefordshire Council continue to waste the public money with no accountability or evidence of service and consideration to the public. They have proposed a significant increase of nearly 5% to council tax in a cost of living crisis. We the public demand how they spend the publics money is reviewed

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about scrutiny of local authority spending are a matter for local councillors, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
